description.narrative: The funding objective is to establish a partnership with a reputable local company in Ethiopia for the production of fortified nutritious food for children and mothers to combat malnutrition. The funds are used to hire on-the ground external staff to work on project operational, technical and commercial viability of the partnership, stakeholder management and preparation of any partnership agreements.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands
